subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Whether the race was close or one-sided, Michael Phelps beat every mortal who got into the pool with him. Now begins the debate. Is he the greatest Olympian ever?
snippet: Whether the race was close or one-sided, Michael Phelps beat every mortal who got into the pool with him. Now begins the debate. Is he the greatest Olympian ever?
